translations: （教堂内的）圣坛，祭坛（altar 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: There were altars for animal sacrifices, cereal, liquid sacrifices.
sentences.translation: 这里也有祭坛来放动物祭品，谷物和液体祭品。

sentences.sentence: It will decree the destruction of all of these altars and high places.
sentences.translation: 它下令摧毁所有的圣坛与高地。

sentences.sentence: In both courts of the temple of the Lord, he built altars to all the starry hosts.
sentences.translation: 他在耶和华殿的两院中为天上的万象筑坛。
